-| wceq(cxms, crab(hs0, ctps, wceq(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmopn, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, ctps)
-| diffsw(hs0, wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ *MetSp ↔(c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 =(MetOpen ` c2)))
⊣ *MetSp = { hs0 ∈ TopSp |(TopOpen ` hs0)=(MetOpen `((dist ` hs0)|`((Base ` hs0)×(Base ` hs0))))}
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, TopSp)
⊣ d(hs0, c1 =(MetOpen ` c2))
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c2 =((dist ` c0)|`(c3 × c3))
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
